rdf:Description.dc:title: A Review of policing in Northern Alberta : findings & recommendations 1992 findings & recommendations.
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Northern Alberta Development Council.
rdf:Description.dc:publisher: [Edmonton, Alta.] : Alberta, Northern Alberta Development Council,
rdf:Description.dc:description: Position paper on the current situation and future form of police service and crime prevention in northern Alberta communities, including financing, problems in the justice system, community-based policing, the role of the R.C.M.P. and the effects of 'remoteness'.
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Police
Justice, Administration of
Criminal justice, Administration of
